subject: Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Jesús Navas scored the decisive penalty as the World Cup holder Spain beat Italy in a shootout after extra time ended, 0-0, in Fortaleza, Brazil.
snippet: Jesús Navas scored the decisive penalty as the World Cup holder Spain beat Italy in a shootout after extra time ended, 0-0, in Fortaleza, Brazil.
